title: 侵侵委派Lighthizer首席談判人員對付支那

replies.msg:
呢條友97年已經反支那入WTO. 又代表過鋼鐵公司做律師

支那又贏


The 71-year-old Mr. Lighthizer, a for­mer steel-in­dus­try lawyer, has told col-leagues he took the trade-rep­re­sen­ta­tive job mainly to try to re­ori­ent China pol­icy. In op-ed col­umns dat­ing back to 1997, Mr. Lighthizer op­posed Chi­na’s en­try into the World Trade Or­ga­ni­za­tion un­der the terms be­ing ne­go­ti­ated. Mr. Trump has called the WTO a “dis­as­ter for this coun­try.”

He has reg­u­larly warned Mr. Trump that Bei­jing was “play­ing him” with of­fers to which he felt Bei­jing wouldn’t carry out. The two men value tar­iffs as ways to pres­sure coun­tries into con­ces­sions.

In a sum­mer in­ter­view with The Wall Street Jour­nal, he said: “We have a [Chi­nese] sys­tem that’s been very ef­fec­tive in build­ing its own in­dus­trial base largely at the ex­pense of us and oth­ers.”
納瓦羅在美國國家公共電台發表談話時說，「美國貿易代表署的大使萊特希澤負責這些談判。他是美國貿易代表署有史以來最強硬的談判代表，他將全力以赴，就最細節的內容進行談判，以降低關稅，取消非關稅壁壘，結束所有這些阻礙市場准入的結構性做法。」
